alert.note: Alert for Anderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 29 at 7:21PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Anderson, Blount, Knox and Sevier. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 820 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Knoxville, Oak Ridge, Maryville, Clinton, Alcoa, Gatlinburg, Farragut, Pigeon Forge, Oliver Springs, Louisville, Rockford, Eagleton Village, Halls, Greenback, Friendsville, Townsend, Wildwood, Lake Forest, Walland and Seymour. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
